title: Bruv 10 rank games in a row and it dosent stop
body: I play and play but after i win 1 game its back on the 10 losing rank buzz can this game get any worse the creators put me with iron players which i am not but silver or even worse bloody wood tier people bruh stop putting me with people whos intention is to feed or to troll or even worse afk i put my best and i guess its not enuf especially with people who dont want to play fix your game asap

replies.body: Also maybe not you the word 'Bruv' and you might get more people replying.

Mechanics,Map Awareness,CS'ing,Pathing,Objective Control,Champion Knowledge,Dueling,Team Fighting, Knowind enemy jg location and Timing Summoner Spells.

Master These and you will climb, always focus on improvement and you will improve, Blaming other people won't help you get better, it will only stop you from your goal.
